item.title: MIUI V11.0.3.0.QDGCNXM Fastboot update for Mi MIX 2S China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi MIX 2S China

Codename: polaris

Version: V11.0.3.0.QDGCNXM | 10.0

Size: 2.7 GB

MD5: 04c5b87e683cce94649c59daeb9b1d7a

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to March 2020. Increased system security.
[App lock]
New: App lock is supported for all apps now
New: Revamped the start page and optimized some features
[Data usage]
Fix: Data usage warning appeared multiple times

Download: Here
